title: Pluto's New Friends
description: Pluto loves being the smallest planet and getting to play with all the other bigger planets until one day when they all decide that Pluto isn't a planet anymore! Pluto is sad until he finds new friends--other dwarf planets like him. Read to find out what Pluto has in common with his new set of pals!
